Detailed Description

Class EdgeOverlap represents the intersection between two edge centered geometry boxes. It is a subclass of hier::BoxOverlap and records the portions of index space that needs to be copied between two objects with edge centered geometry.

See also:
hier::BoxOverlap
pdat::EdgeOverlap

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SAMRAI::pdat::EdgeOverlap::EdgeOverlap ( const std::vector< hier::BoxContainer > &  boxes,
const hier::Transformation &  transformation 
)

The constructor takes the list of boxes and the transformation from source to destination index spaces. This information is used later in the generation of communication schedules.

References SAMRAI::hier::Transformation::getOffset().

SAMRAI::pdat::EdgeOverlap::~EdgeOverlap (  )  [virtual]

The virtual destructor does nothing interesting except deallocate box data.

Member Function Documentation

bool SAMRAI::pdat::EdgeOverlap::isOverlapEmpty (  )  const [virtual]

Return whether there is an empty intersection between the two edge centered boxes. This method over-rides the virtual function in the hier::BoxOverlap base class.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::BoxOverlap.

const hier::BoxContainer & SAMRAI::pdat::EdgeOverlap::getDestinationBoxContainer ( const int  axis  )  const [virtual]

Return the list of boxes (in edge centered index space) that constitute the intersection. The boxes are given in the destination coordinate space and must be shifted by -(getSourceOffset()) to lie in the source index space. The axis argument represents which axis is desired: X=0, Y=1, and Z=2.

Precondition:
(axis >= 0) && (axis < d_dst_boxes.size())

References TBOX_ASSERT.

void SAMRAI::pdat::EdgeOverlap::getSourceBoxContainer ( hier::BoxContainer &  src_boxes,
int &  axis_direction 
) const [virtual]

Get a BoxContainer representing the source boxes of the overlap.

The src_boxes container will be filled with edge-centered source boxes of the overlap in the source coordinate space. The given axis direction is the axis in destination space on input and in source space on output.

Parameters:
[out] src_boxes 
[in,out] axis_direction 
Precondition:
src_boxes.isEmpty()
axis_direction >= 0 && axis_direction < d_dst_boxes.size()
Postcondition:
axis_direction >= 0 && axis_direction < d_dst_boxes.size()

References SAMRAI::hier::BoxContainer::begin(), SAMRAI::hier::BoxContainer::end(), SAMRAI::hier::Transformation::getInverseTransformation(), SAMRAI::hier::BoxContainer::isEmpty(), TBOX_ASSERT, and SAMRAI::pdat::EdgeGeometry::transform().

const hier::IntVector & SAMRAI::pdat::EdgeOverlap::getSourceOffset (  )  const [virtual]

Return the offset between the destination and source index spaces. The destination index space is the source index space shifted by this amount.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::BoxOverlap.

References SAMRAI::hier::Transformation::getOffset().

const hier::Transformation & SAMRAI::pdat::EdgeOverlap::getTransformation (  )  const [virtual]

Refturn the transformation between the destination and source index spaces.

The destination index space is the source index space rotated and shifted by the returned transformation.

Returns:
The transformation.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::BoxOverlap.
